column4: Ex-Merrill Lynch broker spared prison in Qualcomm insider trading case
column5: A former Merrill Lynch stock broker was spared prison after admitting to concealing a Qualcomm Inc executive's insider trading and obstructing a subsequent investigation.

column4: Qualcomm sells UK spectrum rights to Vodafone and CK Hutchison -Bloomberg
column5: Aug 26 Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc has sold its U.K. spectrum rights to Vodafone Group Plc and CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd for about 200 million pounds ($313.8 million)  Bloomberg reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
